text:
when you use search in authoring, the results page does not have the cms menus
at the top. the area information is kept, however, since any link you click will
bring you back to authoring, and the cms menus are back. so this is probably a
cosmetic issue.
creator: nettings@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The search resutls page is hard-coded for the default publication :(

IMO we should redesign this. I posted a comment on dev@lenya.
This is fixed since the search page uses the usecasedocument resource type.
creator: andreas@apache.org
